Wed, 09 Apr 2025 06:00:00 +0000 The man was jailed for five years and three months for sexual offending against a young girl. Photo / 123rf
Comancheros bust: Influential gang member charged with 200kg drug import after burglary at Port of Tauranga https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/comancheros-bust-influence-gang-member-charged-with-with-200kg-drug-import-rug-import-fer-burglary-at-port-tauranga/dbtte3xbtte3xbfjhlrhlrhlrhlrhrhrhqduxyi5opawu/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/comancheros-bust-influence-gang-member-charged-with-with-200kg-drug-import-rug-import-fer-burglary-at-port-tauranga/dbtte3xbtte3xbfjhlrhlrhlrhlrhrhrhqduxyi5opawu/ Jared SavageThe Comanchero was charged months after two men allegedly broke into a shipping container. Wed, 09 Apr 2025 05:23:31 +0000 One of the most influential members of the Comancheros gang has been charged with allegedly importing 200kg of drugs removed by force from the Port of Tauranga.
